$bookdesc01: "The necessity of concealing the Art is\none of the chief anxieties of alchemists. \nWe are sworn to secrecy by heaven and earth and hell
$bookdesc02: "Thence is born a spirit white as snow
$bookdesc03: Heed my warning or death and decay will follow.
$bookdesc04: "The definition of death is the disjunction of the composite
$bookdesc06:
"Some Alchemists fancy that the work from beginning 
to end is a mere idle entertainment; but those who 
make it so will reap what they have sown - nothing. 
We know that next to the Divine Blessing
$bookdesc07: "Among those who devote themselves to the transmutation of metals
$bookdesc08: "Woe unto all ye fools! \nHow ignorant are ye of this Art
$bookdesc_corpse: "If all the mountains were of silver and gold
$bookdesc_tree: The sacrifice of oneself to the pursuit of \nknowledge is the highest tribute to the gods.
$menu_newgame_areyousure: Are you sure you want to start a new game? All progress from current run will be lost.
$menuoptions_display_areyousure: Do you want to keep the new display settings? Old settings will be restored in $0 seconds.
$menuoptions_resetsave_areyousure: Are you sure you want to reset all progress? This cannot be undone!
$menugameover_nextbutton: You are dead - click here for stats
$menuoptions_lowres_tooltip_exp: EXPERIMENTAL. Might cause minor rendering glitches.
$menuoptions_reset_keyboard: Right click to reset to default.
$menuoptions_reset_gamepad: Press B to reset to default.
$menuoptions_configurecontrols_rebind_ke: Press the key or button for $0
$menuupdatenotification_description_gene: A new build of Noita is now available!\nClick here for release notes
$menureleasenotes_eawarning:
Welcome to Noita!
Noita is an early access game.
It contains bugs and may even sometimes crash!
We're working hard to fix things and add new features.
$menu_newwand_pressagain_pick: Press $0 again to pick the wand
$menu_newwand_whichwand_gamepad: WHICH WAND DO YOU WANT TO DROP?
$menu_newwand_whichwand_keyboard: WHICH WAND DO YOU WANT TO DROP? (Click it!)
$menu_newbook_pressagain_pick: Press $0 again to pick the book
$itempickup_purchase_swap: Press $0 to purchase '$1' and swap an item with it
$itempickup_pick_swap: Press $0 to swap an item with '$1'
$itempickup_cannotpick: Cannot pick '$0'. Please get rid of an item to make space for it
$itempickup_cannotpick_closeinventory: Close the inventory first to pick '$0'
$logdesc_heart_blocked: Increased maximum health to $0 ..but some sort of curse blocked the increase of maximum health!
$inventory_shuffle_tooltip: Wands that shuffle cast their spells in random order.
$inventory_actionspercast_tooltip: The number of spells this wand casts when used.
$inventory_rechargetime_tooltip: The time it takes for this wand to recharge when all spells inside it have been cast.
$inventory_manamax_tooltip: Maximum amount of mana this wand can store.
$inventory_capacity_tooltip: The number of spells that can be inserted into this wand.
$inventory_spread_tooltip: The directional deviation of projectiles casted by this wand.
$inventory_alwayscasts_description: This wand casts some spells every time it's used.
$inventory_warning_noactions: WARNING - This wand contains no spells
$inventory_warning_noactions_description: The wand doesn't do anything. Place some spells into the wand's slots.
$inventory_warning_notenoughmana: WARNING - This wand doesn't have enough mana for $0
$inventory_warning_notenoughmana_descrip: Wand has max $0 mana. Casting $1 requires $2 mana.
$inventory_info_frozen: INFO - This wand has been frozen
$inventory_info_frozen_description: A spell prevents the wand from being customized.
$itemtitle_wand_pickup: Picked up a new magic wand
$logdesc_gods_are_very_angry: The Gods are very angry with you
$credits_music: With music by From Grotto and Niilo Takalainen
$credits_fmod: Noita uses FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd
$progress_ending01: Discovered the secrets above and below -
$statusdesc_wet: Wet clothes protect you from fire.
$statusdesc_oiled: Oil makes you slippery and more flammable.
$statusdesc_bloody: Bloody clothes protect you from fire.\nYou sense an increased chance of attaining critical hits.
$statusdesc_slimy: Slimy clothes protect you from fire.\nThe mucus makes moving around difficult.
$statusdesc_radioactive: Toxic sludge in your clothes makes your health degrade slowly.\nWet clothes protect you from fire.\nCan be washed off by liquids.
$statusdesc_alcoholic: Heavy scent of booze oozes of your clothes.\nAiming is disturbed.\nAnd alcohol is flammable!
$statusdesc_poisoned: A poisoning slowly degrades your health.
$statusdesc_teleportation: You teleport uncontrollably every now and then.
$statusdesc_hp_regeneration: A health regeneration spell affects you.
$statusdesc_invisibility: The magical liquid on your clothes makes you invisible.\nThe spell is disturbed by stained or wet clothes.
$statusdesc_on_fire: You're on fire. Find some water!
$actiondesc_scatter_2: Simultaneously casts 2 spells with low accuracy
$actiondesc_scatter_3: Simultaneously casts 3 spells with low accuracy
$actiondesc_scatter_4: Simultaneously casts 4 spells with low accuracy
$actiondesc_i_shape: Casts two spells: one ahead of and one behind the caster
$actiondesc_y_shape: Casts 2 spells in a bifurcated pattern
$actiondesc_w_shape: Casts 3 spells in a trifurcated pattern
$actiondesc_circle_shape: Casts 6 spells in a hexagonal pattern
$actiondesc_pentagram_shape: Casts 5 spells in a pentagonal pattern
$actiondesc_spread_reduce: Reduces the spread of a spell
$actiondesc_gravity: Increases the effect gravity has on a projectile
$actiondesc_gravity_anti: Applies a lifting force to a projectile
$actiondesc_penetrate_walls: Gives a projectile more penetration power
$actiondesc_sinewave: "Makes a projectile move rapidly in a slithering manner
$actiondesc_bounce: Makes a projectile bounce on impact
$actiondesc_homing_shooter: Gives a projectile a path that curves towards you
$actiondesc_damage: Increases the damage done by a projectile
$actiondesc_critical_hit: Gives a projectile +15% chance of a critical hit
$actiondesc_heavy_shot: "Greatly increases the damage done by a projectile
$actiondesc_knockback: Gives a projectile the power to knock back the foes it hits
$actiondesc_recoil: Increases the recoil when casting spells
$actiondesc_recoil_damper: Reduces the recoil when casting spells
$actiondesc_speed: Increases the speed at which a projectile flies through the air
$actiondesc_gore: Makes foes spill more blood when hit with a projectile
$actiondesc_explosive_projectile: Makes a projectile more destructive to the environment
$actiondesc_water_to_poison: Makes any water within a projectile's range turns into poison
$actiondesc_blood_to_acid: Makes any blood within a projectile's range turns into acid
$actiondesc_lava_to_blood: Makes any lava within a projectile's range turn into blood
$actiondesc_necromancy: Makes corpses of creatures killed by a projectile rise to your aid
$actiondesc_sea_lava: Summons a large body of lava below the caster
$actiondesc_sea_oil: Summons a large body of oil below the caster
$actiondesc_sea_water: Summons a large body of water below the caster
$actiondesc_sea_acid: Summons a large body of acid below the caster
$actiondesc_sea_acid_gas: Summons a large body of flammable gas below the caster
$actiondesc_sea_alcohol: Summons a large body of tasty alcohol below the caster
$actiondesc_matter_eater: Makes a projectile eat the environment as it flies
$actiondesc_hitfx_burning_critical_hit: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on burning enemies
$actiondesc_hitfx_critical_water: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on wet (water) enemies
$actiondesc_hitfx_critical_oil: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on oiled enemies
$actiondesc_hitfx_critical_blood: Makes a projectile always do a critical hit on bloody enemies
$actiondesc_hitfx_poltergeist: Gives a projectile the power to animate physical objects
$actiondesc_fireball_ray: Makes a projectile cast fireballs in random directions
$actiondesc_hitfx_oiled_freeze: Makes a projectile freeze enemies drenched in oil
$actiondesc_alcohol_shot: Makes a projectile get the enemies it hits drunk
$actiondesc_teleportation: Spells cast alongside this will teleport enemies
$actiondesc_berserk: "Target enters a state of wild fury
$actiondesc_charm: Target becomes friendly to the caster
$actiondesc_x_ray: See into the unexplored. But not everywhere...
$actiondesc_x_ray_modifier: Projectile lights the way in the darkness
$actiondesc_acid: Projectiles turn into acid on collision
$actiondesc_acid_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of acid
$actiondesc_poison_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of poison
$actiondesc_oil_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of oil
$actiondesc_water_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of water
$actiondesc_blood_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of blood
$actiondesc_gunpowder_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of gunpowder
$actiondesc_fire_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of fiery particles
$actiondesc_burn_trail: Gives a projectile a tail of fire
$actiondesc_torch_electric: Gives your wand a bright but very dangerous light!
$actiondesc_light: Makes a projectile illuminate its surroundings
$actiondesc_duplicate_on_death: Projectile clones itself x2 on collision
$actiondesc_generate_random_deck_5: Current deck is replaced with a random deck of 5 cards
$actiondesc_testbullet: A weak but enchanting sparkling projectile
$actiondesc_light_bullet: A weak but enchanting sparkling projectile
$actiondesc_air_bullet: A brittle burst of air capable of greatly pushing objects
$actiondesc_light_bullet_trigger: A spark bolt that casts another spell upon collision
$actiondesc_light_bullet_trigger_2: A spark bolt that casts two new spells upon collision
$actiondesc_light_bullet_timer: A spark bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_bullet_trigger: A magical arrow that casts another spell upon collision
$actiondesc_bullet_timer: A magical arrow that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_heavy_bullet_trigger: A powerful magical bolt that casts another spell upon collision
$actiondesc_heavy_bullet_timer: A powerful magical bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_slow_bullet: A slow but powerful orb of energy
$actiondesc_slow_bullet_trigger: A slow but powerful orb of energy that casts another spell upon collision
$actiondesc_black_hole: A slow orb of void that eats through all obstacles
$actiondesc_black_hole_big: A growing orb of negative energy that destroys everything in its reach
$actiondesc_decoy: Creates a decoy for distracting enemies
$actiondesc_decoy_trigger: Creates a decoy for distracting enemies that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_spitter_timer: A short-lived magical bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_lance: A magical lance that cuts through soft materials
$actiondesc_rocket_tier_2: A more powerful version of Magic missile
$actiondesc_rocket_tier_3: The most powerful version of Magic missile
$actiondesc_grenade_tier_2: A more powerful version of Firebolt
$actiondesc_grenade_tier_3: The most powerful version of Firebolt
$actiondesc_mine: A crystal that explodes when someone comes nearby
$actiondesc_mine_death_trigger: A crystal that explodes and casts another spell when someone comes nearby
$actiondesc_pipe_bomb: A crystal that explodes when caught in an explosion
$actiondesc_pipe_bomb_death_trigger: A crystal that explodes and casts another spell when caught in an explosion
$actiondesc_digger: A bolt that is ideal for mining operations
$actiondesc_tentacle: Calls a terrifying appendage from another dimension
$actiondesc_tentacle_timer: Calls a terrifying appendage from another dimension! Comes with a timer
$actiondesc_spiral_shot: A mystical whirlwind of magic sparks
$actiondesc_meteor: A destructive projectile from the skies!
$actiondesc_slimeball: A dripping ball of poisonous slime
$actiondesc_bomb_legacy: Summons a bomb that destroys ground very efficiently
$actiondesc_bomb: Summons a bomb that destroys ground very efficiently
$actiondesc_crumbling_earth: Calls the anger of the earth
$actiondesc_circleshot_a: Projectiles fly out in a circular pattern
$actiondesc_circleshot_b: Projectiles fly out in a spiral pattern
$actiondesc_thunderball: A projectile with immense stored electricity
$actiondesc_bloomshot: Spells cast alongside this will have arcs of slime flowing between them
$actiondesc_icecircle: Shoots icy projectiles in a circle
$actiondesc_death_cross: A deadly energy cross that explodes after a short time
$actiondesc_plasma_flare: A magical projectile that accelerates quickly
$actiondesc_keyshot: A powerful projectile. Nothing out of ordinary
$actiondesc_material_debug: ONLY TO BE USED IN DEBUG MODE!
$actiondesc_material_liquid: Drop it in liquid and shoot it!
$actiondesc_circle_fire: An expanding circle of burning air
$actiondesc_circle_acid: An expanding circle of dripping acid
$actiondesc_circle_oil: An expanding circle of slick oil
$actiondesc_material_water: Transmute drops of water from nothing
$actiondesc_material_oil: Transmute drops of oil from nothing
$actiondesc_material_acid: Transmute drops of acid from nothing
$actiondesc_material_cement: Transmute drops of wet cement from nothing
$actiondesc_material_lava: Transmute globs of lava from nothing
$actiondesc_material_gunpowder_explosive: Transmute grains of gunpowder from nothing
$actiondesc_material_dirt: Transmute grains of dirt from nothing
$actiondesc_building_board_wood: Useful for cement construction. REQUIRES SOLAR POWER TO RECHARGE.
$actiondesc_building_back_wall_rock: Provides structural support. REQUIRES SOLAR POWER TO RECHARGE.
$actiondesc_teleport_projectile: A magical bolt that moves you wherever it ends up flying
$actiondesc_teleport_home: Creates a portal to the surface that can be used once per each direction
$perkdesc_extra_money: You gain double the gold per nugget.
$perkdesc_extra_money_trick_kill: 4x instead of 2x gold is dropped when death is an accident.
$perkdesc_repelling_cape: Stains drop at a fast rate (when moving).
$perkdesc_saving_grace: "If you would die and have more than 1 HP
$perkdesc_respawn: Upon death you respawn with 100 health.
$perkdesc_protection_fire: You take no damage from fire.
$perkdesc_protection_radioactivity: You take no damage from toxic sludge and other toxic things.
$perkdesc_protection_explosion: You take no direct damage from explosions.
$perkdesc_protection_melee: You take no damage from close-range enemy attacks.
$perkdesc_protection_electricity: You take no damage from electric shocks.
$perkdesc_teleportitis: You take 20% less damage. You teleport away every time you're hurt.
$perkdesc_stainless_armour: You take 50% less damage as long as you have no active stain status effect.
$perkdesc_edit_wands_everywhere: A divine blessing allows you to tinker with wands everywhere.
$perkdesc_projectile_homing: Your spells home towards enemies very slightly.
$perkdesc_revenge_explosion: "You release a magical explosion upon taking damage
$perkdesc_shuffle_wands: All your wands are replaced with random wands of approximately equal power.
$perkdesc_heavy_ammo: You gain a selection of 2 powerful spells.
$perkdesc_liquid_movement: Liquids don't affect your movement at all.
$perkdesc_extra_shop_item: There will be an additional item in every Holy Mountain you haven't discovered yet.
$perkdesc_poison_burn: Your projectiles have a chance to ignite poisoned enemies.
$perkdesc_destruction_enchancement: You can destroy the environment more effectively.
$perkdesc_damaging_aura: Your spells damage nearby enemies even if they don't hit them.
$perkdesc_vision: You can see more into the darkness.
$perkdesc_no_more_knockback: Enemies can no longer knock you back.
$perkdesc_knockback_control: You can steer while being knocked back.
$perkdesc_roll_again: You get a new set of perks to choose from.
$perkdesc_potion_drop: Enemies have a chance of dropping a random potion upon death.
$perkdesc_gold_no_disappear_while_seen: Gold doesn't disappear as long as it can be seen.
$perkdesc_big_potions: Potions you find contain double the liquid.
$perkdesc_extra_charges: Spells with limited uses can be used twice as many times.
$perkdesc_fast_projectiles: Your projectile spells fly faster than before.
$perkdesc_deadly_environment: "Creatures take increased damage from poison and other liquids
$perkdesc_cursed_power: All your wands gain extra damage but become uncustomizable.
$perkdesc_randomize_spells: All spells in your inventory are replaced with a random spell.
$perkdesc_personal_raincloud: "You gather water when standing in a pool
$perkdesc_helper_orb: An orb flies near you and attacks your enemies.
$perkdesc_extra_wand_slot: You can carry one extra wand.
$perkdesc_extra_potion_slot: You can carry one extra item.
$perkdesc_extra_action_storage: You gain more room for spells
$perkdesc_persuasion: Enemies with low health may start fighting for you.
$perkdesc_melt: Your enemies' corpses melt into slime.
$perkdesc_double_cast: Your wands cast one extra spell when used.
$perkdesc_ability_actions_materialized: Bomb-like spells can be placed in the ITEMS space in inventory and used like throwable items.
$actiondesc_damage_x2: Spells cast alongside this spell deal double damage
$actiondesc_damage_x5: Spells cast alongside this spell deal quintuple damage
$actiondesc_unstable_gunpowder: Makes a projectile release firecrackers when it disappears
$actiondesc_slow_bullet_timer: A slow but powerful orb of energy that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_heal_bullet: A magical bolt with rejuvenative powers
$actiondesc_arc_electric: Creates arcs of lightning between projectiles (requires 2 projectile spells)
$actiondesc_arc_fire: Creates arcs of fire between projectiles (requires 2 projectile spells)
$actiondesc_arc_gunpowder: Creates arcs of gunpowder between projectiles (requires 2 projectile spells)
$actiondesc_arc_poison: Creates arcs of poison between projectiles (requires 2 projectile spells)
$actiondesc_area_damage: Gives a projectile an energy field that constantly deals 3.5 damage to nearby creatures
$actiondesc_summon_rock: Create a mighty rock out of thin air
$actiondesc_summon_egg: Summons an egg that houses a friendly creature
$actiondesc_spitter_tier_2: A more powerful version of Spitter Bolt
$actiondesc_spitter_tier_2_timer: A more powerful version of Spitter Bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_spitter_tier_3: The most powerful version of Spitter Bolt
$actiondesc_spitter_tier_3_timer: The most powerful version of Spitter Bolt that casts another spell after a timer runs out
$actiondesc_transmutation: Transmutes various liquids and powdery substances within a projectile's range into something else
$actiondesc_toxic_to_acid: Makes any toxic sludge within a projectile's range turn into acid
$actiondesc_summon_wandghost: Summons a possessed wand to aid you
$actiondesc_touch_gold: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into gold
$actiondesc_touch_water: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into water
$actiondesc_touch_oil: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into oil
$actiondesc_touch_alcohol: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into alcohol
$actiondesc_touch_blood: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into blood
$actiondesc_touch_smoke: "Transmutes everything in a short radius into smoke
$actiondesc_projectile_transmutation_fie: Projectiles caught within the field transform into harmless critters
$actiondesc_chaotic_arc: Causes a projectile to chaotically fly wherever it wishes
$actiondesc_projectile_thunder_field: Projectiles caught within the field transform into blasts of lightning
$actiondesc_projectile_gravity_field: Projectiles caught within the field are attracted towards its center
$actiondesc_fly_downwards: Causes a projectile to aim straight downwards a short time after casting
$actiondesc_fly_upwards: Causes a projectile to aim straight upwards a short time after casting
$actiondesc_horizontal_arc: "Forces a projectile on a horizontal path
$actiondesc_hitfx_explosion_slime: Makes a projectile explode upon collision with creatures covered in slime
$actiondesc_hitfx_explosion_slime_giga: Makes a projectile explode powerfully upon collision with creatures covered in slime
$actiondesc_hitfx_explosion_alcohol: Makes a projectile explode upon collision with creatures covered in alcohol
$actiondesc_hitfx_explosion_alcohol_giga: Makes a projectile explode powerfully upon collision with creatures covered in alcohol
$actiondesc_fireball_ray_enemy: Makes a projectile turn the creatures it hits into living fireball throwers
$actiondesc_lightning_ray: Makes a projectile cast lightning in random directions
$actiondesc_lightning_ray_enemy: Makes a projectile turn the creatures it hits into living thunderstorms
$actiondesc_tentacle_ray: Makes a projectile cast tentacles in random directions
$actiondesc_tentacle_ray_enemy: Makes creatures hit by a projectile grow tentacles in a chaotic manner
$actiondesc_hitfx_toxic_charm: Makes a projectile charm creatures covered in toxic sludge
$actiondesc_tentacle_portal: Summons a one-way portal to a sinister realm
$actiondesc_gravity_field_enemy: Makes creatures hit by a projectile gain a temporary gravity well that draws projectiles in
$actiondesc_summon_hollow_egg: Summons an otherwise empty egg that casts a spell upon cracking open
$actiondesc_lifetime: Increases the lifetime of a spell
$actiondesc_shortlived_shot: "Makes a projectile lasts only a very short amount of time
$actiondesc_purple_explosion_field: Small explosions appear randomly over a large area
$actiondesc_commander_bullet: Any projectiles shot alongside the command bolt will be attracted to it. Casts 3 extra spells upon being cast
$actiondesc_bounce_explosion: Makes a projectile explode as it bounces
$actiondesc_rocket_downwards: Makes a projectile separate into a bundle of 5 explosive bolts as soon as it moves downwards
$actiondesc_clipping_shot: Gives a projectile the power to go through the ground
$actiondesc_accelerating_shot: Causes a projectile to accelerate as it flies
$actiondesc_avoiding_arc: Makes a projectile shy away from obstacles
$actiondesc_lifetime_down: Reduces the lifetime of a spell
$actiondesc_long_distance_cast: Casts a spell some distance away from the caster
$actiondesc_teleport_cast: Casts a spell from the closest enemy
$actiondesc_heavy_spread: "Gives a projectile a much lower cast delay
$actiondesc_chain_bolt: Fires a mysterious bolt that jumps from enemy to enemy
$actiondesc_glitter_bomb: Summons a bomb that explodes into volatile fragments
$actiondesc_fireball_ray_line: Makes a projectile fire small fireballs perpendicular to its trajectory
$actiondesc_pingpong_path: Makes a projectile fly back and forth
$actiondesc_floating_arc: Makes a projectile float above the ground
$actiondesc_glowing_bolt: An extremely concentrated point of light that explodes after a moment
$actiondesc_random_explosion: Makes a projectile launch a random spell (out of a limited selection) when it hits something
$actiondesc_decelerating_shot: Makes a projectile decelerate as it flies
$actiondesc_rocket_octagon: Makes a projectile launch 8 magical bolts if it moves slowly enough
$actiondesc_blood_magic: "Reduces a spell's mana cost and recharge time greatly
$actiondesc_fizzle: Gives a spell a small probability of short-circuiting
$actiondesc_super_teleport_cast: "Makes a spell immediately jump a long distance
$actiondesc_bounce_laser: Makes a projectile release a bundle of concentrated light as it bounces
$actiondesc_magic_shield: Four guarding lights rotate around you for a time
$actiondesc_big_magic_shield: Eight guarding lights rotate around you for a time
$actiondesc_swarm_fly: Summons five flies to aid you in battle
$actiondesc_swarm_firebug: Summons four fire bugs to aid you in battle
$actiondesc_swarm_wasp: Summon six wasps to aid you in battle
$actiondesc_friend_fly: Summons a friendly fly that attacks your enemies!
$actiondesc_duplicate: Duplicates every spell cast before it
$actiondesc_infestation: A bunch of magical sparks that fly in every direction
$actiondesc_crumbling_earth_projectile: Makes a projectile crumble the earth it hits
$actiondesc_random_static_projectile: Casts one random static projectile spell
$actiondesc_draw_random: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand
$actiondesc_draw_random_x3: Casts a random spell among the spells in your wand three times!
$actiondesc_draw_3_random: Casts three random spells among the spells in your wand
$actiondesc_damage_random: Randomly increases or lowers the damage done by projectiles
$actiondesc_alpha: Casts a copy of the first spell in your wand
$actiondesc_omega: Casts copies of every spell in your wand
$actiondesc_gamma: Casts a copy of the last spell in your wand
$actiondesc_all_nukes: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a nuke; not a good idea
$actiondesc_all_discs: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a giant sawblade
$actiondesc_all_blackholes: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a black hole
$actiondesc_all_rockets: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a magic missile
$actiondesc_all_deathcrosses: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a death cross
$actiondesc_all_acid: Transforms every projectile currently in the air into a pool of acid
$actiondesc_all_spells: You're heavily advised not to cast this spell.
$actiondesc_add_trigger: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon collision
$actiondesc_add_timer: Makes a projectile cast another spell after a short time
$actiondesc_add_death_trigger: Makes a projectile cast another spell upon expiring
$actiondesc_copy_field: A magical field that copies any projectiles near it
$actiondesc_larpa_chaos: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself in random directions
$actiondesc_larpa_downwards: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with a downwards trajectory
$actiondesc_larpa_upwards: Makes a projectile cast copies of itself with an upwards trajectory
$actiondesc_delta: Casts a copy of the next spell in your wand
$actiondesc_larpa_chaos_2: Makes a projectile leave a trail of copies of itself
$actiondesc_chainsaw: A good tool for cutting meat. Also has some magical properties...
$actiondesc_spore_pod: Summons a spore pod that attaches to a surface and then grows and explodes into spikes
$actiondesc_energy_shield_shot: Gives a projectile a shield that deflects other projectiles
$actiondesc_autoaim: Makes a projectile turns towards the nearest visible enemy
$actiondesc_homing_rotate: Makes a projectile turn towards your foes
$actiondesc_homing: Makes a projectile accelerate towards your foes
$actiondesc_swapper_projectile: It was theorized that the source of qualia would be transferred …But it turns out it was the whole body all along.
$actiondesc_propane_tank: Summons a propane tank. Be careful what you wish for.
$actiondesc_megalaser: A spectral wand is summoned that casts a huge beam of light
$actiondesc_bomb_cart: Summons a self-propeled mine cart loaded with explosives
$actiondesc_tiny_ghost: Summons a tiny ethereal being to your help. It may cast stronger spells depending on how much damage you have suffered.
$actiondesc_bounce_spark: Makes a projectile shoot bubble sparks as it bounces
$actiondesc_cursed_orb: A projectile that brings bad luck to anyone it hits
$perkdesc_extra_perk: From now on you will find an extra perk in every Holy Mountain.
$perkdesc_genome_more_hatred: Creatures become more aggressive towards each other.
$perkdesc_genome_more_love: Creatures become more friendly towards each other.
$perkdesc_random_allies: You're allies with a random enemy group.
$perkdesc_strong_kick: Your kicks deal extra damage and knockback.
$perkdesc_projectile_repulsion: "Most projectiles are repulsed by your presence
$perkdesc_multiply_hp: Your HP has been multiplied but you can no longer regain HP.
$perkdesc_golden_i: Gold that you've seen no longer disappears over time.
$perkdesc_extra_knockback: Your spells knock enemies around with more force.
$perkdesc_lower_spread: "Your spells have lower spread and extra damage
$perkdesc_bounce: Almost all your spells bounce around and last longer.
$perkdesc_revenge_tentacle: "You summon a monstrous tentacle upon taking damage
$perkdesc_attack_foot: You grow curious additional limbs that fight for you.
$perkdesc_plague_rats: Dying enemies release rats to serve your bidding! All rats become your friend.
$perkdesc_leggy_feet: You grow disturbing looking limbs that fight for you.
$perkdesc_always_cast: "A random Always Cast spell is added to the wand in your hand
$perkdesc_no_more_shuffle: Most of the wands will be non shuffling. The wands you carry with you turn into non-shufflers too.
$perkdesc_projectile_duplicate: Your spells duplicate as they hit obstacles.
$perkdesc_low_hp_damage_boost: Your spells deal 3x damage when you're under 25 HP or 25% of maximum health.
$perkdesc_peace_with_steve: You make peace with your Gods.
$perkdesc_trick_blood_money: Blood money is dropped when death is an accident.
$perkdesc_wand_experimenter: Firing newly found and unmodified wands heals you.
$itemdesc_mcguffin: This has been said to complete the Work

$itemdesc_mcguffin_11: This has been said to complete the Work
$itemdesc_mcguffin_12: This has been said to complete the Work
$itemdesc_essence_air: Your being controls the air around you!
$itemdesc_essence_alcohol: That was not the best of ideas
$itemdesc_egg_hollow: I wonder if there's anything inside?
$item_description_egg_slime: The egg is covered in slime
$itemdesc_weathercrystal_book: "It is said that to attain great wealth one must be ready to break the very foundation of this world. However
$itemdesc_runestone: A runestone with a strong magical aura. You feel like kicking it.
$itemdesc_key_2: The key whispers secrets and promises; it is ready.
$item_description_broken_wand: This wand has snapped in half but it still crackles with magical energy
$item_description_thunderstone: This small rock makes you feel very charged.
$item_description_moon: This tiny celestial object has a strong gravitational pull.
$item_description_waterstone: "This small rock is hard and solid
$itempickup_orb: You discovered an orb of true Knowledge
$itempickup_orb_evil: You discovered an orb of corrupted Knowledge
$itempickup_orb_discovered: You found a familiar orb of true Knowledge
$itempickupdesc_orb_00: Secrets of endless lava have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_01: Secrets of Earth's anger have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_02: Secrets of otherworldly life have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_03: Secrets of utter destruction have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_04: Secrets of Undeath have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_05: Secrets of fire and brimstone have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_06: Secrets of the Spiral have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_07: Secrets of stormy skies have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_08: Secrets of jubilation have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_09: Secrets of hidden danger have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_10: Secrets of rebuilding have been unlocked to you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_11: This secret should not have been available for you.
$itempickupdesc_orb_13: Secrets of great undoing have been unlocked to you.
$menu_mods_help_exp:
This is an experimental feature.
Use at your own risk. Only run mods from trusted sources!
Upmost enabled mod will be loaded first.
Click mod name to enable/disable the mod.
$menu_mods_help: Use mods at your own risk. Only run mods from trusted sources!\nUpmost enabled mod will be loaded first.\nClick mod name to enable/disable the mod.
$menu_mods_help_paused: Changes will be applied on next restart.
$menu_mods_restart_tooltip: "Warning: some mods may not handle enabling/disabling ingame well - weirdness
$menu_mods_newgame: Start a new game with enabled mods active
$menu_mods_reenablenotificiation: This version changes how mods behave.\nMods need to be re-enabled via the “Mods” menu.
$menu_mods_extraprivilegesareyousure: "This mod has requested extra privileges.\nIf enabled
$menu_mods_extraprivilegesnotification: This mod has requested extra privileges.\nUnsafe mods need to be enabled to run this mod.
$menu_mods_workshopsandboxnotification: Workshop mods cannot be enabled while unsafe mods are on.
$menu_mods_enablinginvalid: This mod is broken and cannot be enabled [Error code #N0174H4X].
$menu_mods_sandboxoffareyousure: Enabling unsafe mods gives all installed mods full access to your computer.\nAre you sure?
$menu_mods_sandboxoffareyousure_steam: Enabling unsafe mods gives all installed mods full access to your computer.\nAre you sure?
$menu_mods_customactivation: \nPlay this mod via the “New game” menu.
$menu_mods_translationactivation: \nEnable this translation via “Language” in the “Options” menu.
$menu_mods_nameconflict: Cannot enable multiple mods with the id “$0”.
$menu_mods_workshop_mod_tooltip: This is a Steam Workshop mod.
$menu_mods_disclaimernotification_exp: This is an experimental feature.\nUse is at your own risk!\nYou should only run mods from trusted sources.
$menu_mods_disclaimernotification: Use of mods is at your own risk!\nYou should only run mods from trusted sources.
$menu_mods_initerrors_log: There were errors when initializing following mods: $0
$menu_mods_workshopdownloading_noprogres: "Downloading Workshop content $0\nIf the downloads don't seem to progress
$menu_mods_modversion_older: This mod has not been tested with the latest version of the modding interface.
$menu_mods_modversion_newer: "This mod has been built with a newer version of the modding interface.\nA newer version of the game might be required.\nOr maybe the mod developer is just using a new version of the game
$menuautosave_text: Autosave found. Looks like the game crashed?\nShould the game attempt to restore the autosave?
$menuautosave_text_mods: Some mods were enabled and might have caused the crash.
$menuoptions_configurecontrols_hint_game: Press B on a control to reset it to default
$menuoptions_configurecontrols_hint_keyb: Right click on a key binding to reset it to default
$menuoptions_showhoverinfonexttomouse: Show hovered material/item name next to mouse: $0
$menuoptions_replayrecorder_tooltip_exp:
EXPERIMENTAL FEATURE
Press $0 to save a replay at any point in the game.

Setting “Replay budget” too high might decrease performance
or make the game crash. Use at your own risk!
$menuoptions_replayrecorder_tooltip:
Press $0 to save a replay at any point in the game.

Setting “Replay budget” too high might decrease performance
or make the game crash. Use at your own risk!
$menuoptions_application_rendered_cursor: Turn this on in case you can't see the mouse cursor.
$menuoptions_gamepaddetected: Gamepad detected!\nEnable gamepads via the Input tab.
$menuoptions_online_features_hint: Turn off to prevent the game from connecting to Nolla Games' servers.\nThis may prevent some features from working.
$menuoptions_ui_allow_shooting_while_inv: Allow firing of wands while inventory is open: $0
$menuoldsavegame_text: A save game with old version was detected.\nWould you like to continue it? (Weird things may occur.)
$menuoldsavegame_text_update9: Empty chunks may appear in the world after loading.\nHeed my warning - this may anger the Gods!\nWould you like to continue?
$menu_worldselect_deleteareyousure: Are you sure you want to delete the world in slot $0?\nThis cannot be undone.
$menu_worldselect_deleteareyousure_playi: Are you sure you want to delete the world you're currently playing?\nThis cannot be undone.
$menu_switchthrowandspray:
We've changed the default values of a few settings:
-Input bindings for Throw and Spray have been swapped around.
-Inventory needs to be closed to cast spells.
Would you like to enable the new defaults? These can be changed in the Options menu.
$menu_newgame_modschangedrestart: The game will restart due to mod changes.
$menu_streaming_description: Let stream viewers interact with your game through the Twitch chat.
$menu_streaming_voting_hint: Allow stream viewers to vote on events that take place in the game.
$menu_streaming_allowusernames_hint: Allow events that display chat user names
$menu_streaming_timevoting_hint: The duration of a single vote
$menu_streaming_distribution_hint:
Awful = very likely to ruin your run..
Bad = bad things can happen.
Neutral = not necessarily goot or bad.
Good = more health and other helpful events.
$menu_streaming_usernames_ghosts: Tiny ghosts can be named after viewers: $0
$menu_streaming_usernames_rats: Rats can be named after viewers: $0
$streaming_integration_votetie: It's a tie! Picking random winner
$menu_replayedit_writinggif: Writing gif - please wait – press $0 to cancel
$menu_replayedit_title_keyboard_exp: REPLAY CLIP EDITOR (experimental) - Right/Left click on frames to set clip start and end points.
$menu_replayedit_title_gamepad_exp: REPLAY CLIP EDITOR (experimental) - [A] - start clip on hovered frame. [B] - end clip on hovered frame.
$menu_replayedit_title_keyboard: REPLAY CLIP EDITOR - Right/Left click on frames to set clip start and end points.
$menu_replayedit_title_gamepad: REPLAY CLIP EDITOR - [A] - start clip on hovered frame. [B] - end clip on hovered frame.
$menu_replayedit_startclip_keyboard: Left click - start clip on hovered frame.
$menu_replayedit_endclip_keyboard: Right click - end clip on hovered frame.
$logdesc_heart_evil: Increased maximum health to $0 ...with the cost of being cursed!
$log_altar_magic_worm: That is not what you seek!
$log_moon_altar: The four essences reveal their secret
$logdesc_moon_altar: The moon's egg cracks open. Its contents have been unlocked
$logdesc_moon_altar_drunk: The moon spills and unlocks its inebriating contents
$logdesc_heart_fullhp_temple: Increased maximum health by $0 and restored health to $1 (regained $2 health)
$log_ocarina_done: Seems like the musical energy is gone...
$log_overingestion_01: Eating any more might kill you
$log_overingestion_03: Eating any more might kill you
$log_overingestion_05: Eating any more might kill you
$log_overingestion_exploding_01: You're feeling like you'll soon explode
$log_overingestion_exploding_03: You're feeling like you'll soon explode
$log_overingestion_exploding_04: You're feeling an explosive tightness in your stomach
$log_overingestion_exploding_05: You're feeling an explosive tightness in your stomach
$log_kantele_done: Seems like the musical energy is gone...
$logdesc_alchemist_key_second: ”I can give you so much in exchange for...”
$logdesc_weathercrystal_broken: Your desire for treasures will surely be your undoing.
$logdesc_gods_are_impressed: The Gods are very impressed with you
$logdesc_temple_peace_temple_break: The Gods look the other way
$log_altar_success_01: The Gods are satisfied with your sacrifice
$log_altar_success_02: The Gods are happy with your sacrifice
$log_altar_fail_00: The Gods aren't happy with your sacrifice
$log_altar_fail_01: The Gods sneer at your untrained sacrifice
$log_altar_fail_02: The Gods mock your crude sacrifice
$log_altar_fail_03: The Gods scorn at your illiterate sacrifice
$log_reality_mutation_01: You sense things are no longer what they used to be
$log_reality_mutation_03: You feel the rules of the Cosmos have shifted
$log_reality_mutation_04: You sense the reality has shifted
$statusdesc_reality_mutation: You sense things are no longer what they used to be.
$bookdesc_allspells: "None other than you is teacher of the truth
$gamemode_normal_desc: Explore a new world.\nThe original Noita experience.
$gamemode_nightmare_desc: For a more challenging experience.\nUnlock this mode by completing the game.
$gamemode_newgameplus_desc: For a more challenging experience.\nUnlock this mode by completing the game.
$gamemode_laboratory_desc: Play around with magic to your heart's content.\nDeath is not a problem.\nUnlock new spells for this mode by casting them.
$gamemode_nightmare_desc_PETRI_is_this_c: Every day a new run setup and a\n chance to play later biomes.\n Play the same seed as many times as you want.
$gamemode_daily_practice_run_desc: "Start a run from a randomized spot
$menureleasenotes_betawarning: "Welcome to the Noita 1.0 Beta version!\nBe warned
$menureleasenotes_betawarning2: "Welcome to the Noita beta branch!\nBe warned
$inventory_chargecapacity_tooltip: The amount of charge this wand can store.
$statusdesc_worm_attractor: You feel like you're future worm food.
$statusdesc_protection_all: You feel strange strength in your body.
$statusdesc_cryptpoison: You lose health until you locate a rare antidote.
$statusdesc_satiated01: You can still fit more in your stomach.
$statusdesc_satiated02: You're feeling full. Any more food will make movement difficult.
$statusdesc_satiated04: You're feeling sickly full. Any more food might hurt you.
$statusdesc_satiated05: You're feeling sickly full and choking.
$statusdesc_satiated06: You most certainly don't feel like eating more.
$statusdesc_ingestion_damage: Any more food or drinking will hurt you.
$statusdesc_ingestion_exploding: You're feeling so full you might explode.
$statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_01: You drank too much.\nAiming is disturbed.
$statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_02: You drank way too much.\nAiming is disturbed.\nDrinking more will make you Poisoned
$statusdesc_ingestion_alcoholic_03: You drank way too much.\nAiming is disturbed.\nDrinking more will give you brain damage
$statusdesc_trip_00: You sense that something is off.
$statusdesc_trip_01: You feel in harmony with the magical forces.
$statusdesc_food_poisoning: You're feeling sick. Nothing stays inside.
$statusdesc_ingestion_freezing: You're feeling cold inside. Movement is difficult.
$statusdesc_curse_cloud_00: You feel like there's a dark cloud hanging over you.
$statusdesc_curse_cloud_01: The weight of the cloud is almost unbearable. Your head hurts.
$statusdesc_curse_cloud_02: All the foul thoughts you have ever had wash over you.
$statusdesc_jarate: Wet clothes protect you from fire.\nYou sense an increased danger of receiving a critical hit.
$streamingeventdesc_protect_enemies: Nearby creatures temporarily block all incoming damage
$streamingeventdesc_polymorph_enemies: Nearby creatures polymorph into random beings
$streamingeventdesc_tiny_ghost_player: You get a few tiny ghost friends
$streamingeventdesc_tiny_ghost_enemy: Nearby creatures get tiny ghost friends
$streamingeventdesc_homing_enemy_project: Nearby enemies' projectiles accelerate toward you
$streamingeventdesc_protect_player: You become invincible for some time
$streamingeventdesc_faster_player: You can move faster for a time
$streamingeventdesc_oiled_player: A cloud of oil spawns on you
$streamingeventdesc_sea_of_x: A huge body of random liquid is summoned
$streamingeventdesc_sea_of_water: A huge body of water is summoned
$streamingeventdesc_sea_of_oil: A huge body of oil is summoned
$streamingeventdesc_sea_of_lava: A huge body of lava is summoned
$streamingeventdesc_bouncy_shots: Your projectiles become bouncy for a time
$streamingeventdesc_boomerang_shots: Your projectiles home back to you for a time
$streamingeventdesc_fizzle: Your projectiles have a chance to fizzle out for a time
$streamingeventdesc_explosive_projectile: Your projectiles become explosive for a time
$streamingeventdesc_give_wand_to_enemy: A nearby creature gets a random wand
$streamingeventdesc_fireball_thrower_pla: You start spewing fireballs for a time
$streamingeventdesc_fireball_thrower_ene: Creatures start spewing fireballs for a time
$streamingeventdesc_rain_barrel: Barrels and other explosives appear out of thin air
$streamingeventdesc_rain_hiisi: A bunch of Hiisi appear out of thin air
$streamingeventdesc_rain_worm: Worms appear out of thin air
$streamingeventdesc_rain_potion: Potions appear out of thin air
$streamingeventdesc_rain_bomb: Bombs appear out of thin air
$streamingeventdesc_gravity_player: You attract projectiles for a while
$streamingeventdesc_gravity_enemies: Creatures start attracting projectiles for a while
$streamingeventdesc_portal_east: A portal leading somewhere far away
$streamingeventdesc_portal_beginning: A portal leading to the surface
$streamingeventdesc_trail_water: Your projectiles leave a trail of water
$streamingeventdesc_trail_oil: Your projectiles leave a trail of oil
$streamingeventdesc_trail_acid: Your projectiles leave a trail of acid
$streamingeventdesc_trail_fire: Your projectiles leave a trail of fire
$streamingeventdesc_trail_lava: Your projectiles leave a trail of lava
$streamingeventdesc_trail_poison: Your projectiles leave a trail of poison
$streamingeventdesc_trail_gunpowder: Your projectiles leave a trail of gunpowder
$streamingeventdesc_trail_alcohol: Your projectiles leave a trail of alcohol
$streamingeventdesc_transmutation: Nearby materials transmute into acid for some time
$biomemodifierdesc_fog_of_war_reappears: A mysterious darkness lingers in this place
$biomemodifierdesc_flooded: Where did all this water come from?
$biomemodifierdesc_gas_glooded: There's a smell of gas in the air
$biomemodifierdesc_haunted: A terrible chill runs down your spine
$biomemodifierdesc_alchemic: There's a spirit of Ancient Art in the air
$biomemodifierdesc_peaceful: You feel a sense of peace
$biomemodifierdesc_portal_upwards: You feel there's a special route nearby
$biomemodifierdesc_portal_downwards: You feel there's a special route nearby
$gamemode_dailyrun_desc_played: You've played the daily. Try again tomorrow.
$gamemode_dailyrun_desc_played2: You already had your chance at the daily run. Try again tomorrow.
$gamemode_dailyrun_desc_played3: You already had your chance. Try again tomorrow.
$perkdesc_revenge_bullet: "You return fire when hit by projectiles
$logdesk_curse_ghost: Your greed will haunt you wherever you go...
$logdesk_curse_permaoil: Your greed sticks to you like tar...
$logdesk_curse_nofly: Your greed weighs you down heavily...
$logdesk_curse_strongenemies: Your greed makes others dislike you...
$logdesk_curse_keepmoving: Your greed makes you overly hasty...
$log_curse_info: Seek refreshment to cure the curse.
$log_curse_reward: You gain additional gold while the curse is active.
$logdesc_curse_secret: Ancient alchemists sought to utilize even the power of a curse...
$gamemode_dailyrun_desc_offline: Please turn on Online features to play this mode.
$menureleasenotes_noita10: "Welcome to Noita Epilogue Update!\nNoita used be an Early Access game
$perkdesc_angry_ghost: "An angry spirit comes to your aid
$logdesc_all_spells: One does not escape quite so easily!
$perkdesc_spell_duplication: "Your projectile spells have a chance to duplicate
$perkdesc_faster_wands: All wands you're currently carrying gain a bonus to their cast delay & reload time.
$itemdesc_gourd: "Can be thrown to deal damage. Upon breaking
$menu_streaming_eventliststartnewgame: You can configure the enabled events here after entering the game.\n(The game will remember the settings.)
$streaming_integration_toofeweventsenabl: Please enable at least four events\nvia the Streaming options menu!
$streamingeventdesc_improve_wands: All wands in your vicinity get slightly better stats
$streamingeventdesc_weaken_wands: All wands in your vicinity get slightly worse stats
$actiondesc_line_arc: Makes a projectile fly only in cardinal or diagonal lines
$perkdesc_mana_from_kills: "Every time an enemy near you dies
$perkdesc_mega_laser: You will gain a curious artefact
$perkdesc_foodclock: Being well nourished is good for you
$menu_streaming_uiposleft: Position UI to the left side of the screen: $0
$menu_streaming_uiposleft_hint: EXPERIMENTAL: UI might sometimes look funny
$log_alchemist_key_alt_second: The key has taken in the full song
$logdesc_alchemist_key_alt_reward: But the key might have other stories to tell...
$itemdesc_essence_greed: You gain more gold but a curse will haunt you
$menuoptions_cosmeticparticlecoeff_hint: Particle amount will be reduced at this rate if there are lots of particles
$biomemodifierdesc_plant_infested: It smells like soil after rain
$biomemodifierdesc_mechanical: You can hear the sounds of machinery
$biomemodifierdesc_tunneled: You can hear faint sounds of construction
$biomemodifierdesc_hiisi_invasion: You can hear Hiisi grunts from the distance
$biomemodifierdesc_pipes: You can hear someone clanging on metal pipes
$biomemodifierdesc_spooky: The hair in the back of your neck stands up
$biomemodifierdesc_twisted: It feels like your head is spinning
$itemdesc_mega_beam_stone: This artefact has a picture of a celestial beam.
$log_beam_stone: You feel like you should move...
$logdesc_beam_stone: Something terrible is going to happen
$release_notes_10_highlights:
"HIGHLIGHTS:
New Daily Practice Run game mode.
Twitch integration - let stream viewers make your game even more more chaotic.
Biome modifiers - biomes are sometimes a bit different from the usual form.
Some biomes have simulated temperature effects.
Lots of gameplay and UI tweaks and additions.
Visual and audio enhancements.
New spells
$continue_10_warning: We HIGHLY recommend that you don't try to load pre-1.0 saves. Everything will be broken and the gods will most definitely be angry.
$credits_falling: Noita is powdered by the Falling Everything Engine\nNoita uses FMOD Studio by Firelight Technologies Pty Ltd
$credits_licenses: Please see licenses/Attributions.txt for Creative Commons attribution list.
$menustreaming_nsa: Please turn on Online features to use this feature.
$menu_oldsave_verybroken1: We HIGHLY recommend that you don't try to load pre 1.0 saves. Everything will be broken and the Gods will most definitely be angry.
$bookdesc02_forged: The essence of life and death.
$bookdesc06_forged: To have true knowledge\n is to see in the darkness of ignorance.
$bookdesc09_forged: To walk a mile in someone else's boots.
$bookdesc10_forged: True knowledge is a slippery thing.\nThe unfortunate side effect of our divine stone.
$streamingeventdesc_heal_ghost: You get a few healing ghost friends
$streamingeventdesc_player_gas: Your body exudes flammable gas for a time
$streamingeventdesc_areadamage_player: You gain a field that deals damage to nearby enemies for a time.
$streamingeventdesc_areadamage_enemy: Enemies near you gain fields that deal damage to you if you get close.
$streamingeventdesc_twitchy: You have trouble controlling your wand for a time
$streamingeventdesc_shield_ghost: You get a shielding ghost friend
$streamingeventdesc_matter_eater: All projectiles eat up the ground for a time
$streamingeventdesc_invisible_player: You become invisible for a time
$streamingeventdesc_invisible_enemy: Enemies become invisible for a time
$streamingeventdesc_neutralized: All projectiles near you become neutralized for a time
$streamingeventdesc_high_spread: All projectiles have very high spread for a time
$streamingeventdesc_bubble: You're encased in a safe bubble for a time
$statusdesc_twitchy: Your hand spasms randomly and your spells can hurt you!
$gamemode_dailyrun_desc_offline_mode:
Offline Daily Run
The seed is different from the Online Daily Run.
But you can play this seed as many times as you like
within the 24 hours.
$biomemodifierdesc_gravity_fields: You feel an invisible force pushing and pulling you
$biomemodifierdesc_fungal: The air is filled with fungal spores
$menu_streaming_usernames_visible: Creatures can be named after viewers: $0
$menu_modsettings_changes_restart: Changes will be applied when you restart the game.
$menu_modsettings_changes_worldgen: Changes will be applied when you start a new game.
$perkdesc_exploding_gold: "Gold dropped by enemies explodes when it disappears
$actiondesc_quantum_split: Makes a projectile split into three projectiles whose existences are entangled
$actiondesc_chain_shot: "Causes a projectile to cast a copy of itself upon expiring
$actiondesc_teleport_projectile_short: A shortlived magical bolt that moves you wherever it ends up flying
$perkdesc_worm_bigger_holes: Worms now dig a larger area around them.
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus: A group of helpful little homunculi appears to aid you
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus_dark: A helpful little homunculus comes to your aid
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus_fire: A helpful little homunculus comes to your aid
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus_heal: A helpful little homunculus comes to your aid
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus_laser: A helpful little homunculus comes to your aid
$streamingeventdesc_homunculus_punch: A helpful little homunculus comes to your aid
$actiondesc_mu: Every modifier-type spell in the current wand is applied to a projectile
$perkdesc_extra_slots: The wands you're currently carrying gain 1-3 additional spell slots (to a maximum of 25).
$perkdesc_teleportitis_dodge: You teleport a short distance away when an enemy projectile is near.
$perkdesc_extra_mana: "Your currently held wand loses half its capacity
$perkdesc_homunculus: "Every time you leave a Holy Mountain
$actiondesc_larpa_death: A projectile will shoot out 8 copies of itself when it expires or hits the ground
$actiondesc_bounce_larpa: A projectile will launch a copy of itself when it bounces
$statusdesc_hearty: Your maximum health is temporarily halved.
$item_description_safe_haven: Can be thrown to summon a cozy hut
$itemdesc_kakka: This mysterious spiral-shaped artefact smells horrible and feels warm to the touch
$statusdesc_weaken: Your protective perks are temporarily disabled.
$actiondesc_zeta: Copies a random spell in another wand you're holding
$perkdesc_laser_aim: "Your spells fly faster and have lower spread
$actiondesc_ball_lightning: Summons three short range electrical orbs
$perkdesc_low_recoil: "Recoil caused by your spells is greatly reduced
$perkdesc_projectile_repulsion_sector: Projectiles that fly into a small sector in front of you get blown away.
$perkdesc_projectile_eater_sector: Projectiles that fly into a small sector behind of you disappear.
$statusdesc_wither: You're temporarily more vulnerable to all damage types.
$actiondesc_nolla: The duration of a projectile is set to zero
$perkdesc_revenge_projectile: "You return projectiles back to enemies upon taking damage
$actiondesc_homing_accelerating: A projectile homes towards enemies at an increasing pace
$actiondesc_teleport_closer: Brings the target hit closer to you
$actiondesc_fanning_shot: Launches multiple projectiles in a fan-like pattern
$actiondesc_spells_to_power: Converts any nearby projectiles cast by you into extra damage
$actiondesc_enemies_to_power: Increases a projectile's damage based on the number of creatures nearby
$actiondesc_explosion_light: A large explosion that doesn't damage the ground
$actiondesc_phi: Casts a copy of every projectile-type spell in the current wand
$actiondesc_burst_x: Simultaneously casts as many spells as you have left uncast in your wand
$actiondesc_worm_launcher: Grabs a worm from a nether realm at high velocity for a short time
$actiondesc_spiraling_shot: A projectile flies in a spiralling pattern
$actiondesc_orbit_shot: A projectile orbits the point of its origin
$actiondesc_form_potion: A small vortex sucks material and forms a small potion filled with it
$actiondesc_temporary_platform: Summons a shortlived bit of ground
$actiondesc_laser_emitter_thrower: A projectile fires beams of light in random directions
$actiondesc_laser_cross: Plasma beams fly in an X-shaped pattern
$perkdesc_personal_laser: "You constantly fire a devastating plasma beam
$logdesc_greed_curse_crystal2: The curse is active once again!
$actiondesc_if_enemy: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 15 enemies nearby
$actiondesc_if_projectile: The next spell is skipped if there are less than 20 projectiles nearby
$actiondesc_if_hp: The next spell is skipped if you have more than 25% health left
$actiondesc_if_end: Any Requirement spells before this will skip all spells between them and this spell
$actiondesc_if_half: The next spell is skipped every other time this spell is cast
$actiondesc_if_else: "If a Requirement spell before this succeeds
$actiondesc_bloodlust: "A projectile gains a hefty damage boost
$actiondesc_colour_red: Gives a projectile a red sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_green: Gives a projectile a green sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_purple: Gives a projectile a purple sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_orange: Gives a projectile a orange sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_blue: Gives a projectile a blue sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_yellow: Gives a projectile a yellow sparkly trail
$actiondesc_colour_rainbow: Gives a projectile a randomly colored sparkly trail
$statusdesc_blindness: You can barely see a thing!
$actiondesc_explosion_remove: Makes a projectile no longer explode
$perkdesc_vomit_rats: Vomit near you evolves into helpful rat minions
$streamingeventdesc_add_always_cast: Your currently-held wand gets a permanent always cast spell! (max. 4)
$actiondesc_expanding_orb: A slow projectile that increases its damage over time
$actiondesc_homing_projectile: Makes a projectile home towards other projectile spells
$actiondesc_vacuum_powder: Sucks powder-like materials nearby and releases them upon expiring
$actiondesc_vacuum_liquid: Sucks liquid materials nearby and releases them upon expiring
$bookdesc_fisher: "”Here I'm safe. I am safe.\nI left the others behind
$statusdesc_homing_shooter: Your spells home towards yourself for a time.
$statusdesc_drunk_ui: Your spells are less accurate and you're more flammable for a time.
$statusdesc_movement_slower_ui: You move slower for a time.
$statusdesc_confusion_ui: Your movement is unsure for a time.
$boss_wizard_8: Your projectiles home back to you!
$actiondesc_vacuum_entities: Sucks nearby projectiles and creatures into the middle of the field instantaneously
$actiondesc_explosion_tiny: Limits the radius of a projectile's explosion heavily
$actiondesc_liquid_to_explosion: Converts nearby nonmagical liquids into explosive gunpowder
$actiondesc_laser_emitter_four: "Four deadly plasma beams in a cross-shape. Look out
$actiondesc_laser_emitter_ray: A projectile fires plasma beams in all directions!
$actiondesc_bounce_laser_emitter: A projectile launches a plasma beam upon bouncing
$actiondesc_homing_cursor: A projectile rotates towards the direction you're aiming
$bookdesc_mestari:
"”The secret lies in music!

The key to the heavens' lock is borne from music all over the world.

And in a way
$streamingeventdesc_fireworks: Entirely safe (for a given value of safe)
$perkdesc_contact_damage: Enemies near you take damage; the damage is higher the lower your health gets.
$item_description_evil_eye: This eye-shaped artefact projects a malevolent glare
$actiondesc_sigma: Copies every static projectile -type spell in the wand when cast
$actiondesc_tau: Copies the two following spells in the wand when cast
$logdesc_reality_mutation: You hear the word “$0” echoing and shifting in colours
$actiondesc_laser_emitter_cutter: A plasma beam specialized in cutting materials!
$actiondesc_laser_emitter_wider: Makes plasma beam spell's beam wider
$streamingeventdesc_rain_blackhole: Multiple black holes open in your vicinity!!
$perkdesc_adventurer: "Every time you visit a new area
$log_adventurer: New area reached! You regain 60 health.
$actiondesc_damage_forever: "If the wand has more than 50 mana
$actiondesc_homing_area: "If a valid target appears somewhere in the proximity of a projectile
$actiondesc_bomb_detonator: All nearby explosive spells cast by you instantly detonate
$actiondesc_orbit_discs: Makes four sawblades rotate around a projectile
$actiondesc_orbit_fireballs: Makes four fireballs rotate around a projectile
$actiondesc_orbit_nukes: Makes four… nukes(?!) rotate around a projectile
$actiondesc_orbit_lasers: Makes four plasma beams rotate around a projectile
$actiondesc_orbit_larpa: Makes four copies of a projectile rotate around it
$actiondesc_slow_but_steady: The reload time of the wand is set to exactly 1.5 seconds
$itemdesc_wandstone: This artefact can open the potential of wands to you even without perks...
$itemdesc_greed_die: The name may be more apt than one thinks.
$itemdesc_powder_stash: A handy box for carrying powdery materials.
$itemdesc_powder_stash_2: A handy bag for carrying powdery materials.
$itemdesc_powder_stash_3: A handy pouch for carrying powdery materials.
$itemdesc_powder_stash_4: A handy sack for carrying powdery materials.
$perkdesc_hungry_ghost: Summons a happy minion who'll eat enemy projectile every now and then.
$statusdesc_damage_plus_small: Your damage is boosted slightly for a time.
$perkdesc_death_ghost: Dying creatures leave behind a spirit that deals damage in a small area.
$perkdesc_risky_critical: You gain additional chance to deal critical hits as long as there are enemies near you.
$actiondesc_curse: Imbues a projectile with a curse that makes the target hit by the projectile to waste away
$actiondesc_exploding_ducks: Summons a chaotic flock of spicy ducks
$actiondesc_money_magic: Spends 5% of your current gold and adds damage to a projectile proportional to the amount spent
$statusdesc_curse_wither_projectile: You take 25% extra damage from projectiles.
$statusdesc_curse_wither_explosion: You take 25% extra damage from explosions.
$statusdesc_curse_wither_melee: You take 25% extra damage from melee attacks.
$statusdesc_curse_wither_electricity: You take 25% extra damage from electricity.
$actiondesc_curse_wither_projectile: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra projectile damage for a time
$actiondesc_curse_wither_explosion: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra explosion damage for a time
$actiondesc_curse_wither_melee: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra melee damage for a time
$actiondesc_curse_wither_electricity: Target hit by a projectile takes 25% extra electricity damage for a time
$actiondesc_worm_shot: Summons a giant worm to cause havoc for a moment!
$actiondesc_black_hole_death_trigger: A slow orb of void that eats through all obstacles and casts another spell as it expires
$perkdesc_food_clock: "You inflict more damage the more satiated you are
$actiondesc_rainbow_trail: Gives a projectile a trail of rainbow
$itemdesc_gold_orb: "It hums slightly. What happens if you kick it
$itemdesc_stonestone: It looks like it could stand the test of aeons.
$logdesc_dark_moon_altar: from my blood... from my blood... from my blood... from my blood...
$actiondesc_remove_bounce: A normally bouncy projectile stops doing so
$itemdesc_mcguffin_33: "It is said to possess powers which mere mortals can scarcely comprehend
$actiondesc_glue_shot: A projectile that explodes into a sticky mess
$actiondesc_petrify_a: Turns a wounded enemy into stone
$actiondesc_petrify_b: A critical hit turns an enemy into stone
$actiondesc_petrify_c: A critical hit turns a wounded enemy into stone
$actiondesc_worm_shot_big: Summons a massive worm to cause havoc for a moment!
$actiondesc_fan: Pushes incoming projectiles away in a narrow cone formation
$perkdesc_lukki_minion: Summons a lukki minion to your help.
$perkdesc_angry_levitation: Killing an enemy makes you replenish some of your levitation power.
$perkdesc_destructive_spells: Your spells destroy ground more efficiently.
$perkdesc_mold: Slime near you spontaneously turns into fungal creatures.
$perkdesc_cordyceps: Fungal creatures spawn from the corpses of enemies killed by you.
$actiondesc_homing_short: A projectile flies towards targets when near them
$itemdesc_seed_b: It glows with high intensity now...
$itemdesc_seed_d: It's still not fully grown but radiates heat.
$itemdesc_book_music_b:
“One in the pond
One in the tree
One on the ledge
One under the sun”
$itemdesc_book_music:
”The one below listens to my songs...
 
G D# G E A
 
E C B G# F”
$itemdesc_book_s_a: "”Among the great Alchemical endeavours there are some that
$itemdesc_book_s_b: "”...Bring the slumbering Seed to life by letting it soak in the rays of the Sun
$itemdesc_book_s_c: "”...The Alchemical process requires great Fire and Heat; for this purpose
$itemdesc_book_music_c: "”Once the Key has listened to you
$itemdesc_book_robot: ”This machinery is unlike any I've seen before. Did the Hiisi create it? Or was it always here?”
$actiondesc_knife_ring: A shrinking ring of 8 knives is summoned
$actiondesc_iceball: A magical ball of frozen fire
$perkdesc_minion_powerup: Any minions spawned to your aid have increased damage output and health.
$logdesc_collision_1: The old are devoured for the new to take their place
$logdesc_collision_2: The new heart of the world is at balance
$logdesc_collision_3: The new heart of the world grows with corruption at its center
$actiondesc_tntbox: Summons a box of explosive matter
$actiondesc_tntbox_big: Summons a large box of explosive matter
$streamingeventdesc_all_access_teleport: Creatures near you gain the ability to enter the Holy Mountain portals.
$itemdesc_gold_orb_greed: It seems to trickle with blood...
$statusdesc_weaken_combined: Your resistances and protective perks are disabled temporarily.
$itemdesc_musicstone: This artefact is covered in note-shaped engravings and is pulsing at a steady pace.\nIs that the sound of distant music?
$perkdesc_mega_beam_stone: You gain an artefact that allows you to call the celestial rage.
$actiondesc_sun: Creates an immensely powerful entity; Can be cast only once
$actiondesc_darksun: Creates an immensely powerful entity; Can be cast only once
$log_balance_1: The world is at a balance
$log_balance_3: The world is overburdened by light
$perkdesc_gas_blood: You bleed flammable gas instead of blood.
$biomemodifierdesc_sunlight: Everything is glowing in a mysterious light...!
$menu_newgame_gamemodewithslotstooltip: Start a new game or continue an existing save.
$menu_newgame_saveandnewgame: Save current world and start a new game
$menu_saveslotselect_deleteslotfirst: Delete the world in this slot\nto be able to start a new game.
$menuoptions_steamcloud_warning_limit: Steam Cloud save size limit warning
$menuoptions_steamcloud_warning_tooltip: The game will warn you if the size of save data exceeds the given amount.
$menu_steamcloud_size_warning: Warning: Save size is over $0 MB.
$menu_steamcloud_size_warning_desc: Steam Cloud synchronization might take a long time.\nClick here to turn off Cloud sync.
$menu_steamcloud_filecount_warning_desc: Steam Cloud doesn't support that many files.\nThings probably aren't gonna work.\nClick here to turn off Cloud sync.
$menu_steamcloud_warning_turnoff_hint: (You can switch this warning off via Options.)
$biomemodifierdesc_invisibility: You suddenly have trouble focusing your eyes...
$itemdesc_book_essences: "”The four Essences represent the four Elements that form this visible World...\nImbued with their Terrible Power
$itemdesc_book_hint: "”One of my brethren ran away in order to escape our predicament ...\nThey felt our understanding of this world was to be forbidden.\nThey hid something here
$actiondesc_blood_to_power: A projectile gains additional damage at the cost of 20% of your health
$actiondesc_meat_to_power: "Gives a projectile the ability to suck up nearby blood and meat
$actiondesc_toxic_to_power: "Gives a projectile the ability to suck up nearby toxic sludge and poison
$itemdesc_book_diamond: "”In my dream I saw a great Diamond...\nIt invited me within
$perkdesc_iron_stomach: You no longer suffer from negative effects of eating.
